name: MThreaded/OO NIST Statistical Suite
short_description:
This project is a Multithreaded & OO C++ version of NIST Statistical Test Suite which has been developed by Juan Soto in 1999.
This is object oriented so that you can use it easily in your programs. 
Also you can use the power of parallelism cause it is multithreaded.
Enjoy it!
summary: Multithreaded & OO NIST Statistical Test Suite (C++ version)
